about_the_game:
In Coffie Simulator, step into the world of coffee and experience the thrill (and chaos) of running your own café! Your dream? To own the best coffee shop in town. But it won’t be easy—you’ll need to master the art of coffee-making, keep your customers happy, and manage your shop like a pro.

RULE YOUR OWN SHOP

  • Design & Customize – Create the coffee shop of your dreams!

  • Stock Up & Manage – Keep an eye on your supplies or risk running out when you need them most.

  • Handle Your Finances – Every bean counts! Spend wisely and invest in upgrades.

  • Expand & Upgrade – Improve your shop to attract more customers and build your coffee empire.

SERVE THE PEOPLE

  • Over 1,000 Unique Customers – Each with their own personalities and preferences!

  • Your Choices Matter – Treat customers well… or badly! Your reputation will shape how they react.

  • Stay on Your Toes – Follow every order carefully; slow service or mistakes could drive customers away forever!

ENTER THE WORLD OF COFFEE

  • From Simple to Complex – Learn and master recipes, from a basic espresso to the most intricate latte art.

  • Realistic Brewing Mechanics – Use professional barista tools to craft the perfect cup.

  • Master the Espresso Game – Precision is key! Extract, steam, and serve like a real barista.

EXPLORE A DYNAMIC WORLD

  • Every Save is Unique – No two playthroughs are the same! Customers, events, and challenges change with each game.

  • Weather Affects Business – A rainy day might mean more customers—how will you adapt?

  • Surprises Await – Uncover hidden events and unexpected twists as you grow your café.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit OS required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit OS required
